tool.name: IPA MS2 annotation

param.label: Mapped isotope patterns
param.name: mapped_isotope_patterns
param.help: A dataset containing the MS1 data. Ideally obtained from map_isotope_patterns

param.label: MS2 fragmentation data
param.name: MS2_fragmentation_data
param.help: A dataset containing the MS2 data. (If a csv file fails kindly use a tsv file.)

param.label: all possible adducts table
param.name: all_adducts
param.help: A dataset containing the information on all the possible adducts given the database.

param.label: MS2 Database
param.name: MS2_DB
param.help: A dataset containing the database containing the MS2 information.

param.name: CSunk
param.label: cosine similarity for unknown
param.help: cosine similarity score associated with the 'unknown' annotation. Default 0.7.

param.name: mzdCS
param.label: MS2 mz threshold
param.help: maximum mz difference allowed when computing cosine similarity scores. If one wants to use this parameter instead of ppmCS, this must be set to 0. Default 0.

param.name: ppmCS
param.label: maximum ppm for cosine similarity scores
param.help: maximum ppm allowed when computing cosine similarity scores. If one wants to use this parameter instead of mzdCS, this must be set to 0. Default 10.

param.name: evfilt
param.label: same collision energy
param.help: If true, only spectrum acquired with the same collision energy are considered. Default value False.

tool.help: :: Annotation of the dataset base on the MS1 and MS2 information. Prior probabilities are based on mass only, while post probabilities are based on mass, RT, previous knowledge and isotope patterns. <expand macro="references"/>
